#summary Portuguese Web Archive's spellchecker.

= Introduction =

Misspellings lead IR systems to provide bad results without users even realizing their mistake. Users assume lack of quality in the system, which decreases their satisfaction and return. We detected this problem in the Portuguese Web Archive. Hence, we analyzed existing solutions for spelling suggestion and integrated in our user interface the solution that provided the best results.

The following report describes the adopted methodology and the obtained results.

The datasets (in Portuguese) used can be downloaded from [http://www.linguateca.pt/Repositorio/CorrOrtog/].
